comments.body: Since this is `GitHub Action` specific issue, shall we use `export PYSPARK_PYTHON` in GitHub Action side?

Looks like I can even try to (de)serialize to/from JSON string for complex types to work around.

But I think it's an overkill for now. So far, there look not many tests that use complex types for UDF test cases. I will add it later if we see some values on that.

BTW, I think case to case inheritance is forbidden but regular class to case is fine. I don't think this is a good practice but at least affected scope is only tests and it's minimised change. So I guess it's fine.
